cause.description:
This idea to counter the millions of members who think we should free the so called "palestinian" state. Mind you, the name is robbed from the Romans who occupied Jewish territory! This land doesn't belong to the arabs, never has and never will!
1. Israel is God sent, it was promised to them in the Bible
2. The Bible is the infallbile word of God
3. God condemns terrorists but is willing to forgive!
cause.mission: Make the truth known about the faulty nonsense by Jewish-Hating Arabs and their liberal comrades
cause.name: SAVE ISRAEL: BANISH PALESTINE
